const CartItem = ({ cartImg, imgAlt, CartTitle, CartSubtitle, cartPrice, cartDiscount, cartId, cartQuantity, callremoveFromCartHandler, callupdateCartHandler, callMoveToWishlistHandler }) => ( <>

{CartTitle}

{CartSubtitle}

Rs.{cartPrice} Rs.3600

{cartDiscount} off
callupdateCartHandler(cartId,"increment")} >+

{cartQuantity}

cartQuantity <=1 ? callremoveFromCartHandler(cartId):callupdateCartHandler(cartId,"decrement")} >â”€
); export { CartItem };
